topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0 Beta: Deploying the Networking Role Patch

body.p: Before launching the hlm generate command, deploy the following patch to update the nuage role required to deploy the HP Helion OpenStack Cloud.

ol.li: Copy the patch file to the ~/ directroy on the HLM host.

Change to the kenobi-configuration-processor directory:
cd ~/kenobi-configuration-processor
Execute the following command to deploy the patch: patch -p1 < ../knc-nuage-role.patch

Execute the following command to integrate the patch into the installation environment:
cd ~/cg-hlm/hlm-build ./hlm_prepare-env.sh

body.p: When the hcfgproc command is executed, the updated configuration file will be used.
Return to the KVM + ESX installation.
